author: MTV News Staff
title: Inside Pink Siifu’s Collision Course Of Black Punk Experimentation
description: Los Angeles artist Pink Siifu breaks down his latest album, 'Negro,' including its genre-mashing origin and exploration, how he's been keeping his mind limber during quarantine, and his plans to transform it into a visual installation.
content:
By Jaelani Turner-Williams
As creatives face restlessness and scheduling adjustments during the COVID-19 pandemic, Los Angeles-based artist Pink Siifu kept the release date of his new album, Negro (styled in all caps), fixed to a time thats dearest to him hi… [+5962 chars]
